DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Sample Optimal Cutting Temperature Compound Embedding Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the sample was embedded in Optimal Cutting Temperature (OCT) compound.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Sample Optimal Cutting Temperature Compound Embedding
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation._A solution of water soluble glycols and resins that provide a specimen support matrix for cryostat sectioning at temperatures of -10 degrees C and below._To surround an object with a firm chemical substance such as wax or resin, in order to perform cutting of thin sections for microscopic examination.

Concepts.definition: A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A solution of water soluble glycols and resins that provide a specimen support matrix for cryostat sectioning at temperatures of -10 degrees C and below.:To surround an object with a firm chemical substance such as wax or resin, in order to perform cutting of thin sections for microscopic examination.

Concepts.definition: A solution of water soluble glycols and resins that provide a specimen support matrix for cryostat sectioning at temperatures of -10 degrees C and below.
To surround an object with a firm chemical substance such as wax or resin, in order to perform cutting of thin sections for microscopic examination.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for initial GDC new CDE request. mc 8/25/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
